Question: Targus CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Targus

Product 1

- Targus will introduce its latest innovations in laptop cases and tech accessories at CES® 2024, including an expanded line of premium, sustainable tech accessories, a new eco-friendly laptop case collection made from recycled ocean-bound plastic, an award-winning workspace intelligence system, and a powerful, dual-host Hybrid Triple Video Docking Station with Keyboard/Video/Mouse (KVM)-sharing capabilities.

- The new lineup includes sustainable EcoSmart™ tech accessories featuring up to 85 percent post-consumer recycled plastic, ultra-efficient Bluetooth®, energy harvesting, and recycled packaging. An example is the ErgoFlip™ EcoSmart™ Mouse, named a CES 2024 Innovation Award Honoree.

- Targus will also launch the Coastline EcoSmart Collection of laptop bags made from recycled ocean-bound plastic, featuring outer material made from certified ocean-bound plastic and internal lining from recycled PET.

- The revolutionary MiraLogic® Workspace Intelligence System provides remote control and visibility over modular IT ecosystems across the enterprise, enhancing productivity, reducing costs, and improving sustainability.

- The USB-C® Dual Host Hybrid Triple Video KVM Docking Station with Dual 100W Power allows seamless and easy connection and control of two laptops and up to three monitors.
Summary_cn:
Targus

产品1

- Targus将在CES® 2024上推出其最新的笔记本电脑包和科技配件创新，包括扩展的高级可持续科技配件系列，由回收的海洋塑料制成的全新环保笔记本电脑包系列，屡获殊荣的工作空间智能系统，以及具有键盘/视频/鼠标（KVM）共享功能的强大的双主机混合三路视频扩展坞站。

- 新系列包括可持续发展的EcoSmart™科技配件，使用高达85％的后消费回收塑料，超高效的蓝牙®技术，能量收集和回收包装。例如，ErgoFlip™ EcoSmart™鼠标被授予CES2024创新奖提名。

- Targus还将推出由回收的海洋塑料制成的Coastline EcoSmart系列笔记本电脑包，外部材料采用经过认证的海洋塑料，内衬采用回收PET材料。

- 革命性的MiraLogic®工作空间智能系统可在整个企业中远程控制和监控模块化IT生态系统，提高生产力，降低成本，改善可持续性。

- USB-C®双主机混合三路视频KVM扩展坞站同时支持两台笔记本电脑和最多三个显示器的无缝连接和控制，提供双100W电源。
